.. _apptainer_registry_list:

apptainer registry list
-----------------------

List all OCI credentials that are configured

Synopsis
~~~~~~~~



  The 'registry list' command lists all credentials for OCI/Docker registries
  that are configured for use.

::

  apptainer registry list

Examples
~~~~~~~~

::


    $ apptainer registry list

Options
~~~~~~~

::

  -h, --help   help for list

SEE ALSO
~~~~~~~~

* :ref:`apptainer registry <apptainer_registry>` 	 - Manage authentication to OCI/Docker registries

*Auto generated by spf13/cobra on 8-Aug-2025*
